messages.title: My Plan for Witney & West Oxfordshire

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £102m extra for A40 upgrades in the biggest step forward in a generation.
£33.9 bn for the NHS & more money for every pupil in every school.

mentions.candidate: Robert has, in only two years, secured a massive funding boost on work to ease congestion, delivering on his 2017 election promise.

issues.education: Our schools and health services are critical to all of us. Robert has campaigned for more for both and now this Conservative government has delivered.
issues.health: £33.9 bn for the NHS & more money for every pupil in every school.

leaflet.personalStatement: Robert is a hard-working, genuinely local candidate, who is active all over our area, all year round - not just at election time.

politicalExperience.achievements: Robert has a proud record of delivering on the issues that matter to West Oxfordshire.

images.caption: Robert Courts with views of the A40 and interacting with local community.
